title: Manamey Lyrics David Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Manamey
Singer: Karthik
Lyrics: Mohan Rajan
Music: Prashant Pillai (feat. Tao Issaro)
Movie: David		Other Songs Lyrics
1. Vaazhkaye
2. Maria Pitache
3. Kanave Kanave
4.Mannamey
5. Iruvanil Ulavavaa
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Oh Manamey oh manamey
oh manamey theeyai theendu
oh ranamey oh ranamey
oh ranamey valiyai thaandu

yutham enbadhu ratham endbadhu
dharmam thaanada
kaayam aarinaal niyaayam maaridum
udaney thodangada

vettai thodangida vetkai theerndhida
vegam kollada
maayam purindhadhum
vazhkai kasandhidum
unmai thaanda

Oh Manamey oh manamey
oh manameytheeyai theendu
oh ranamey oh ranamey
oh ranamey valiyai thaandu

paavam endru edhuvum illai
paadhai maarada
niyaayam dharmam ellaam ingae
sandhai porulada

uzhagam unnai vanangida neeyum
kobam kollada
peyum dheivamum manidha unadhu
bayamey thaanada

Hey paadhai maarum podhu
nenjil acham thevayilai
pon vannan marutha podhu angae
budhan thondrinaarey

Oh Manamey oh manamey
oh manamey theeyai theendu
oh ranamey oh ranamey
oh ranameyvaliyai thaandu

English Translation
I tried my best :)
oh mind! oh mind!
oh mind! touch the fire.
Oh wound! oh wound !
oh wound! jump over the pain.

war and blood
both are justice, friend.
if wound heals, justice will change
start now, friend.

with hunt and passion,
have the speed, friend.
when illusion is understood,
life will bitter ,
its a truth, friend.

oh mind! oh mind!
oh mind! touch the fire.
Oh wound! oh wound !
oh wound! jump over the pain.

nothing is sin, so
change the path.
justice, law, everything
is bazzaar thing.

world to bow you
have anger,friend.
ghost and god,
both are humans fear, friend.

when you change path
have no fear.
when ponvannan denied,
Buddha formed there.

oh mind! oh mind!
oh mind! touch the fire.
Oh wound! oh wound !
oh wound! jump over the pain.
